name: Kuwait Water Transport Company
description: Kuwait Water Transport Company (KWT) is a leading provider of water transportation services in the Middle East, specializing in the delivery and distribution of potable water through a fleet of modern tankers. Established in 1995, KWT has built a reputation for reliability and efficiency in water supply, catering to both residential and commercial customers. The company operates an extensive network across Kuwait, ensuring timely and safe delivery of water to meet the growing demands of the region. KWT is committed to sustainability and environmental stewardship, utilizing cutting-edge technologies to reduce its carbon footprint and enhance operational efficiency. The company also engages in community initiatives to promote water conservation and educate the public on the importance of sustainable water management practices. With a dedicated team of professionals and a customer-centric approach, KWT continues to be at the forefront of the water transport industry, adapting to the evolving needs of its clients while maintaining high service standards.

seo.meta_title: Kuwait Water Transport Company | Reliable Water Transportation Services
seo.meta_description: Discover Kuwait Water Transport Company (KWT), the leader in water transportation services in the Middle East. Learn about our commitment to sustainability and customer satisfaction.

faq.question: What services does KWT provide?
faq.answer: KWT provides potable water delivery services for residential and commercial customers in Kuwait.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Kuwait Water Transport Company?
faq.answer: The CEO of Kuwait Water Transport Company is Ahmed Al-Sabah.

faq.question: Where is KWT headquartered?
faq.answer: KWT is headquartered in Kuwait City, Kuwait.
